title: #340: Nothin' But a Bikini and  Prayer
description:
It’s an avalanche of “sorry!”s on Real Housewives of Orange County while Tamra preps for her big competition. RHONJ has way fewer sorries, but hey. Dolores finally finished her kitchen, so there’s that. Subscribe at http://www.patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens for bonus episodes, ringtones, and live group video chat parties.

Timestamps:
00 Crappens Superfight: Katherine Dennis VS Leanne Locken
19:22 RHOC
1:14:50 RHONJ
